title: [1.7.10][SuperMassiveTech]恒星科技----手握日月摘星辰![已汉化]
author: 残枫落血

replies.author: sjq245
replies.txt_content:
标题: [1.7.10][SuperMassiveTech]恒星科技----手握日月摘星辰![已汉化] 本帖最后由 sjq245 于 2017-10-21 09:39 编辑 

Super Massive Tech

前言
这个mod是我在看悟訢的多人模组生存的时候看到的，去Curse翻了一下，发现MCBBS没人转，于是我就把这个mod转过来了，因为个人在玩和FTB星系科技类似的自制整合包，所以感觉还是挺有用的

关于汉化
感谢@天雷233  的汉化教程地址:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=661473&page=1#pid11324616
介绍
方块

黑洞存储器
Curse上说是可以存储大约1兆的物品或者液体
应该算是和MFR的异次元储存器一个级别的储存神器


黑洞漏斗
这个没看懂，他说是(Pulls from inventories up to 6 blocks away, and inserts them into the inventory it is attached to. Also pulls in nearby items.)感谢956483830补充，黑洞漏斗是将半径6格内的物品吸起来


恒星收割机??
Curse的介绍有点神奇，其实就是一个存储恒星用的方块，可以把恒星里的RF能量抽出来,发电量很可观    如图↓


首先你需要做一个恒星储存器，然后把恒星放进去，就可以产生RF


航点？(WayPoint)
类似于信标，可以标记任何东西，可以命名或者改色，带着重力头盔可以看见坐标点。

黑洞
你不会喜欢它的


物品



恒信，是这个mod的核心物品，内部存储的巨大的能量


重力装甲[IC既视感]
可以抵挡大量伤害，还有其他用途
Gravity Resist 
The base effect of the armor, conteracts all gravitational sources and makes you float as if you were in microgravity. 
Applies to: ALL
Modes: ON, OFF
Tool-Switcher
When activated, it picks the best tool in your hotbar for the current block you are mining.
Applies to: Chestplate
Modes: ON, OFF
HUD
Shows a compass on the top of your screen, and also some useful notifications in the bottom left, such as when armor abilities are toggled on and off. Also allows you to see all your waypoints and their names, so that you may easily navigate to any of them.
Applies to: Helmet
Modes: ON, Compass Only, Text Only, OFF
Field: 
Anti-Grav:All entities nearby, in a certain (configurable) radius, will slowly float upwards around you, as if their gravity was reversed. 
Repulsor: Repels all nearby entities from the player. 
Attractor: Attracts all nearby entities to the player. 
Applies to: Chestplate 
Modes: Anti-Grav, Repulsor, Attractor, OFF
上面就是他的功能，未汉化 大概就是重力和反重力，然后自动切换合适工具，窗口上的HUD之类的

作者的未来展望:
Other Features:An achievement system! This mod has many achievements to help guide you along, as well as some enhancements for vanilla achievements.?

In-game config editing! This mod is among the first to support the new forge feature. From the main menu, simply go to mods -> select Super Massive Tech -> config, and you will be able to configure most anything without restarting the game!成就系统还有重启一个没有加载这个mod的世界？？？

至此,这个mod已经了解的差不多了
下载地址在这里~！
记得下前置(在附件里)

Cruse:
https://mods.curse.com/mc-mods/minecraft/224363-super-massive-tech

百度盘
EN:http://pan.baidu.com/s/1hs15FbI汉化:看附件
